description: Application for Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref: P2017/2961/FUL dated 19.07.2018.  The amendments comprise of revisions to condition 67 (Approved plans) to enable the introduction of metal louvered floors and panels at ground floor level on the eastern and northern elevation of the residential buildings.
decision_conditions:
The wording of condition 67 attached to planning permission ref: P2017/2961/FUL dated 19 July 2018 shall now read as follows:
